definitions.definition: Someone who romps; especially, a girl or young woman who indulges in boisterous play; a tomboy.
A period of boisterous play, a frolic; now especially, a bout of sexual activity, especially when illicit.
An enjoyable, fast-paced but essentially inconsequential film, play, or other piece of entertainment.
A decisive victory; a game, match etc. which is won easily.
To play about roughly, energetically or boisterously.
definitions.example: When the kids're allowed to romp in the bedroom, they break something.

definitions.definition: (Often used with down) To press forcefully, to encourage vehemently, to oppress.

definitions.example: England romped to an easy win over Australia.

definitions.definition: To engage in playful or boisterous sex.
